last_episode_to_air.overview: With Brother Blood at full power and Conner left in critical condition, the Titans join forces to find and defeat Sebastian once and for all.
last_episode_to_air.name: Titans Forever

75450_details.name: Titans
75450_details.overview: A team of young superheroes led by Nightwing (formerly Batman's first Robin) form to combat evil and other perils.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: In season one, Dick Grayson and Rachel Roth, a special young girl possessed by a strange darkness, get embroiled in a conspiracy that could bring Hell on Earth. Joining them along the way are the hot-headed Starfire and loveable Beast Boy. Together they become a surrogate family and team of heroes.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: In season two, following the aftermath of their encounter with Trigon, Dick Grayson reforms the Titans. Under his supervision in their new home at Titans Tower, Rachel, Gar and Jason Todd train together to hone their hero abilities and work together as a team. They are joined by Hank Hall and Dawn Granger aka Hawk and Dove and Donna Troy aka Wonder Girl. Although these original Titans attempt to transition into a regular life, when old enemies resurface everyone must come together to take care of unfinished business.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: In season three, circumstances draw our heroes to Gotham City, where they will reunite with old friends and face new threats.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: Having saved Gotham, the Titans hit the road to head back to San Francisco. But after a stop in Metropolis, they find themselves in the crosshairs of a supernatural cult with powers unlike anything they’ve faced before.

75450_details.tagline: Heroes will rise ... or Gotham will fall.

last_episode_to_air.overview: Forced into an impossible situation during her fight with Kirigan, Alina makes a fateful decision that alters her relationship with magic — and Mal.
last_episode_to_air.name: No Funerals

85720_details.name: Shadow and Bone
85720_details.overview: In a world cleaved in two by a massive barrier of perpetual darkness, a young soldier uncovers a power that might finally unite her country. But as she struggles to hone her power, dangerous forces plot against her. Thugs, thieves, assassins and saints are at war now, and it will take more than magic to survive.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Dark forces conspire against orphan mapmaker Alina Starkov when she unleashes an extraordinary power that could change the fate of her war-torn world.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: On the run after the showdown with Kirigan, Alina and Mal find new allies — and face heartrending choices — in their quest for more mythical amplifiers.

last_episode_to_air.overview: Leif says a painful goodbye. Harald's new love is not what she seems. A key battle comes to an end, but the war to rule over Norway is just beginning.
last_episode_to_air.name: The Reckoning

116135_details.name: Vikings: Valhalla
116135_details.overview: In this sequel to "Vikings," a hundred years have passed and a new generation of legendary heroes arises to forge its own destiny — and make history.

last_episode_to_air.overview: Perilously close to war, the leaders of Piltover and Zaun reach an ultimatum. But a fateful standoff changes both cities forever.
last_episode_to_air.name: The Monster You Created

94605_details.name: Arcane
94605_details.overview: Amid the stark discord of twin cities Piltover and Zaun, two sisters fight on rival sides of a war between magic technologies and clashing convictions.

last_episode_to_air.overview: Warned about General Abbot's plans, Gus and his friends prepare to take a stand and defend the hybrid kids, no matter what it takes.
last_episode_to_air.name: The Ballad of the Last Men

103768_details.name: Sweet Tooth
103768_details.overview: On a perilous adventure across a post-apocalyptic world, a lovable boy who's half-human and half-deer searches for a new beginning with a gruff protector.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Captured and imprisoned by the Last Men, a very special deer boy named Gus takes action to help his newfound hybrid friends escape before it's too late.

103768_details.tagline: The end of our world is the beginning of his.

last_episode_to_air.overview: After the fateful events at Aretuza, Geralt and Yennefer struggle to pick up the pieces and reunite their family as war comes to the Continent.
last_episode_to_air.name: The Cost of Chaos

71912_details.name: The Witcher
71912_details.overview: Geralt of Rivia, a mutated monster-hunter for hire, journeys toward his destiny in a turbulent world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Geralt embraces his destiny as he protects Ciri from the forces battling for control of the Continent — and from the mysterious power she possesses.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Destiny brought them together. Dangerous forces are trying to tear them apart. Geralt and Yennefer fight to keep Ciri safe as war brews on the Continent.

last_episode_to_air.overview: With the fate of Dreamland hanging in the balance, a mother battles her daughter for beauty, power and immortality. But living forever comes at a price.
last_episode_to_air.name: Goodbye Bean

73021_details.name: Disenchantment
73021_details.overview: Set in a ruined medieval city called Dreamland, Disenchantment follows the grubby adventures of a hard-drinking princess, her feisty elf companion and her personal demon.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: It all endeth here. To save Dreamland from Queen Dagmar’s wicked rule, Bean must vanquish her mother and outrun a prophecy that foretells she will kill someone she loves. The stakes are as high as ever as our heroes face Satan, a headless corpse, an evil scientist, and most terrifying of all — their true destiny.

last_episode_to_air.overview: Bei Yuan tells Ah' Xu that Prince Jin was not after the armory, but after a secret left by his tribe about a place which would help the country's occupants thrive well for a long time. The secret place was rumored to have a key belonging to six people with different surnames. Ah' Xu's father had tried to find its location along with his friend, Qin Huai Zhang.
last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 36

119362_details.name: Word of Honor
119362_details.overview: Zhou Zi Shu gets embroiled in a conspiracy in the martial arts world after quitting his job as the leader of an organization tasked with protecting royalty. He meets Wen Ke Xing, a mysterious martial artist who escapes from the Ghost Valley to avenge his parents’ deaths. They become fast friends and embark on an adventure to find a legendary treasure that will give its owner ultimate power over jianghu.

71194_details.name: The King's Avatar
71194_details.overview: In the multiplayer online game Glory, Ye Xiu is regarded as a textbook and a top-tier pro-player. However, due to a myriad of reasons, he is kicked from the team. After leaving the pro scene, he finds work in an Internet Cafe as a manager. When Glory launches its tenth server, he throws himself in to the game once more. Possessing ten years of experience, the memories of his past, and an incomplete, self-made weapon, his return along the road to the summit begins!

last_episode_to_air.overview: The Straw Hat crew strives to take down Arlong and the Fishmen once and for all. After a tense family reunion, Luffy inches closer to his dreams.
last_episode_to_air.name: WORST IN THE EAST

111110_details.name: ONE PIECE
111110_details.overview: With his straw hat and ragtag crew, young pirate Monkey D. Luffy goes on an epic voyage for treasure.

50878_details.name: Empresses in the Palace
50878_details.overview: Zhen Huan, a 17-year-old innocent introduced into the imperial court as the latest concubine of Emperor Yong Zheng. Her dreams of a new life of love and prosperity are swiftly dashed as she enters a dog-eat-dog world of treachery and corruption.
50878_details.tagline: An epic tale of love, betrayal and scandal in Imperial China.

last_episode_to_air.overview: As the first-class mage exam concludes and the test-takers go their separate ways, farewell leads to departure - but the next stage of Frieren's journey has only just begun.
last_episode_to_air.name: It Would Be Embarrassing When We Met Again

209867_details.name: Frieren: Beyond Journey's End
209867_details.overview: After the party of heroes defeated the Demon King, they restored peace to the land and returned to lives of solitude. Generations pass, and the elven mage Frieren comes face to face with humanity’s mortality. She takes on a new apprentice and promises to fulfill old friends’ dying wishes. Can an elven mind make peace with the nature of life and death? Frieren embarks on her quest to find out.

last_episode_to_air.overview: Innocent Zero leaves a fusion of dead monster bodies that form a giant in his wake. Seeing Mash fight against this monster in a trapped, hopeless situation where all magic has become ineffective, the students from the school start to cheer him on.
last_episode_to_air.name: Mash Burnedead and His Good Friends

204832_details.name: MASHLE: MAGIC AND MUSCLES
204832_details.overview: In the magic realm, magic is everything—everyone can use it, and one’s social status is determined by their skill level. Deep in the forest, oblivious to the ways of the world, lives Mash. Thanks to his daily training, he’s become a fitness god, but he harbors a secret that could turn his life upside down—he can’t use magic! When he’s found out, rather than his life being over, he’s unexpectedly enrolled in magic school, where he must beat the competition!

86546_details.name: The Light in Your Eyes
86546_details.overview: Time manipulation comes with a steep price for a young woman, who becomes 78 years old overnight after using a mysterious watch.
86546_details.tagline: Every single day was dazzlingly beautiful.

last_episode_to_air.overview: Forgiveness is not easy, but Young does promise to see Soo again after her surgery - which occurs during his pivotal game against Boss Kim.
last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 16

47091_details.name: That Winter, the Wind Blows
47091_details.overview: Circumstances condemn Oh Soo and Oh Young to loveless lives. After the untimely death of his first love, Oh Soo turns to an ambitionless life as a derelict gambler. The gorgeous Oh Young should be leading the perfect life as an heiress, but when her parents’ divorce crumbles the family, she faces the reality of living life alone—particularly in light of her increasingly impaired vision. When these two heavy souls cross paths, fate delivers a chance meeting that will change their lives forever.

last_episode_to_air.overview: The truth comes to light, and everyone scrambles to protect those they love. As the pieces fall into place, the hostesses pay one last tribute to Sue.
last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 24

130330_details.overview: In the red light district of 1980s Taipei, women at a popular Japanese night club navigate jealousy, heartbreak, friendship and love.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: In the red-light district of 1980s Taipei, women at a popular Japanese nightclub navigate jealousy, heartbreak, friendship, love, and betrayal.

In order to salvage the team, Baek Seung Su urges him to give him a period of one week, in which he makes a bid to an IT company to persuade it to buy the team from Jaesong Group.

95484_details.name: Stove League
95484_details.overview: Se Young is the youngest head of the management team of Dreams, a cellar-dwelling baseball team. She's highly recognized for her perseverance and intense passion for the team. One day, Seung Su is appointed as a general manager. Although he's been working in the sports field, the teams he led to the championship were unpopular, and some of them were even disbanded after winning the league due to the financial difficulties of their parent companies. Would this unlucky new general manager be able to steer Dreams to the championship with passionate Se Young?

last_episode_to_air.overview: Not yet ready to let Jeong-u go, Geu-ru runs away from home. As their cohabitation comes to an end, Sang-gu's qualification as a guardian is determined.
last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 10

97970_details.overview: An ordinary entrepreneur joins a secret government mission to capture a Korean drug lord operating in South America.

94384_details.overview: Two nefarious schemes taking place 10 years apart entangle a dauntless triad member, who must break out of prison to rescue a loved one.

57647_details.overview: A man, who is an autistic savant, aspires to become a paediatrician. He overcomes societal discrimination and uses his exceptional abilities to achieve his dreams.

last_episode_to_air.overview: When Yoon Dae Hyung's private army surrounds Hweon and his retinue, Yang Myung finds himself on the verge of killing his brother.

45579_details.name: The Moon Embracing the Sun
45579_details.overview: Years after she's assumed dead by the palace, a young noblewoman, now trained as a shaman, returns to court to reclaim her rightful position as queen.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: After enemies order her killed, future queen Yeon Woo is rescued and raised by a shaman. She returns to court years later with no memory of her past.

76715_details.name: Misty
76715_details.overview: When a popular anchorwoman for a prime time news show becomes the suspect in a murder case, her estranged husband - who has worked as a prosecutor in the past but now works as a public defender - decides to defend his wife.

last_episode_to_air.overview: In an effort to maintain her social status, a mother uses extreme methods to prevent her daughter's grades from dropping lower.
last_episode_to_air.name: ADHD is Necessary

80759_details.name: On Children
80759_details.original_name: 你的孩子不是你的孩子
80759_details.overview: Adapted from the novel by author Wu Hsiao-Le, the series consists of five independent stories about parenting, as well as children's pressures of growing up, when faced with the tragic consequences of social pressure, parental oppression and family dysfunction. Each story is told in two parts in this ten-part series.

last_episode_to_air.overview: Efforts to locate the ringleader of the runaway gang places Eun-seok in grave danger. Geun-hee faces a confrontation about her principles.

112833_details.overview: A tough judge balances her aversion to minor offenders with firm beliefs on justice and punishment as she tackles complex cases inside a juvenile court.

71497_details.overview: Woo Ah-Jin lives a luxurious life due to her wealthy father-in-law, but her father-in-law's finances become decimated and her husband betrays her. Woo Ah-Jin's life hits rock bottom. Park Bok-Ja is a mysterious woman and she hides her heartbreaking story. She brings about fierce hardship on Woo Ah-Jin.

last_episode_to_air.overview: Dongbaek and Yong-sik come to a sinking realization about the Joker, Gyu-tae goes after what he wants, and Jong-ryeol makes peace with Jessica.

93097_details.name: When the Camellia Blooms

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Dongbaek is a single mother. When a potential new love enters her life, she finds ways to defy the social stigmas surrounding her.

93097_details.tagline: Now that I think about it, everything about my life was nothing but a miracle.

last_episode_to_air.overview: Do Min Joon's departure is too difficult to bear for Song Yi, even three years later.
last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 21

60957_details.name: My Love From Another Star
60957_details.overview: An alien who came to Earth 400 years ago is almost able to return to his own planet, but when he meets a famous actress, he doesn't want to go home.

seasons.name: Specials
seasons.overview: Do Min Joon is an otherworldly beauty, literally. After crash landing on Earth 400 years ago, Min Joon has diligently observed humans for centuries, ultimately coming to cynical conclusions. On top of being a super babe, Min Joon's got enhanced vision, hearing and agility — all the more reason to believe he's superior to everyone on Earth. That is, until he pursues the beautiful actress Cheon Song Yi for a romance out of this world.

60957_details.tagline: A love story not of this earth.

last_episode_to_air.overview: Joseon remains steadfast. The Righteous Army perseveres on its course. Ae-sin keeps her flame ablaze, while Hui-seong, Dong-mae and Eugene try to help.
last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 24

75820_details.name: Mr. Sunshine
75820_details.overview: Set in the early 1900s, this drama tells the story of a young man from Korea who grows up in the United States. When he returns to Korea as a US Marine Corps officer, he meets and falls in love with a noblewoman who is fighting for Korean independence. Their romance is complicated by social class and political ideology.

last_episode_to_air.overview: Seon-u gradually returns to her normal life. One day, she comes home to find that Jun-yeong has disappeared — and all that's left is a note from Tae-o.
last_episode_to_air.name: Back to Gosan

96164_details.name: The World of the Married
96164_details.overview: Ji Sun Woo is an associate director of a family clinic with a perfect life—a great career, married to a handsome, young-looking man, mother to an adoring son, and surrounded by seemingly caring friends. She couldn't be more content. Lee Tae Oh, her husband, is an aspiring movie director. However, when his temptation leads him to betray Sun Woo along with the people around her, she gets driven to revenge. The perilous twists-and-turns of a married couple's life unfolds.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: A turbulent twister of lies, betrayals and revenge tears apart the seemingly picture-perfect marriage between a doctor and a filmmaker.

96164_details.tagline: She was living her dreams but a betrayal turned her life into a nightmare.

last_episode_to_air.overview: A fire approaches as if it would devour Doldam Hospital at any moment. Only after evacuating all the patients do the staff realise Teacher Kim was gone.
last_episode_to_air.name: Dreamers

68398_details.name: Dr. Romantic
68398_details.overview: An eccentric, triple board-certified virtuoso surgeon leaves a top job in Seoul and ends up at a provincial hospital, where he mentors young doctors.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Boo Yong-joo was once a famous surgeon at the peak of his career at a major hospital. But he suddenly gives it all up one day to live in seclusion and work as a neighborhood doctor in a small town. He now goes by “Teacher Kim (Kim Sa-bu)” and refers to himself as the “Romantic Doctor”. Meanwhile, Kang Dong-joo became a doctor to make something of himself after growing up poor, and he seeks out VIP patients to achieve the success that he desperately wants. Yoon Seo-jung is a passionate young surgeon who is haunted by a mistake from her past and tries to get over it. When Dong-joo and Seo-jung meet the quirky Teacher Kim, their lives and careers will never be the same again.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Along with genius Teacher Kim, Cha Eun-jae is a second year fellow in the cardiosurgery department who enjoys studying and has confidently walked the path of an elite student for most of her life. Seo Woo-jin, a cynical second year fellow who doesn’t believe in happiness because of his hardships growing up, but he shows impressive levels of concentration and talent when he is performing surgery.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview:
Teacher Kim used to be alone in protecting Doldam Hospital, but now he's not alone anymore. With the mindset that he'll did anything if it gives money, there is Seo Woo-jin who has been reborn as a doctor who truly knows how to care for patients. There is Cha Eun-jae, who no longer runs out of the operating room due to anxiety.

Teacher Kim, who has dreamed of build a regional trauma center with his students and colleagues. Finally, a regional trauma center built at Doldam Hospital. A perfect trauma center with a clean exterior and state-of-the-art facilities but it couldn't open properly. The regional trauma center faces a precarious fate...  Will Teacher Kim be able to establish the regional trauma center at Doldam Hospital which was his long-cherished desire?

68398_details.tagline: May values ​​not die and beauty not be shallow...

97565_details.name: Forest
97565_details.overview:
Kang San-Hyeok is a member of the 119 special rescue team. He is handsome and smart, but he does not remember his childhood. Jung Young-Jae is an enthusiastic surgical resident.

Kang San-Hyeok and Jung Young-Jae meet at a mysterious forest. Even though they do not want to, they must live together in the mysterious forest. Living there, they discover small pleasures. Kang San-Hyeok and Jung Young-Jae soon uncover a secret about themselves and the forest.

last_episode_to_air.overview: The king faces a dilemma concerning a long-held secret, as revealing it could undo his life's work. The queen gently offers him words of wisdom.

156406_details.overview: A spirited queen tries to rein in her rowdy sons in order to make one of them the next king of Joseon, while her competitors vie to snatch the throne.

96997_details.overview: A determined Qing dynasty princess contends with palace intrigue and a vendetta against her family while navigating the treacherous terrain of romance.

125255_details.name: Use for My Talent
125255_details.overview: Because of his incomplete family, Gu Ren Qi has a closed up personality and mysophobia. Shuang Jiao used to have a happy family, but later lost her mother in a car accident, and became a slovenly person. The two became acquainted when Shuang Jiao becomes an employee in Gu Ren Qi's cleaning company. The two became closer as they get to know each other. Under each other's influence, they began to heal from their wounds.

last_episode_to_air.overview: The Counters give it their all to fight the mighty Pil-gwang. Will Ju-seok be able to overcome his demons and put an end to this life-or-death battle?
last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 12

113268_details.name: The Uncanny Counter
113268_details.overview: A group of supernatural demon hunters known as "Counters," each with unique abilities, disguise themselves as employees of a noodle restaurant, while tracking down evil spirits that terrorize the mortal world.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Noodle shop employees by day and demon hunters by night, the Counters use special abilities to chase down malevolent spirits that prey on humans.

seasons.name: Season 2: Counter Punch
seasons.overview: Armed with new powers and fresh recruits, the Counters continue their battle against evil demons who feed on humans.

113268_details.tagline: We sell noodles and catch evil spirits!

last_episode_to_air.overview: Mun-yeong decides she's going to publish the new fairy tale after all. Everyone comes together at the hospital for a reading of the book.
last_episode_to_air.name: Finding the Real Face

96462_details.name: It's Okay to Not Be Okay
96462_details.overview: Desperate to escape from his emotional baggage and the heavy responsibility he’s had all his life, a psychiatric ward worker begins to heal with help from the unexpected – a woman who writes fairy tales but doesn’t believe in them.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: An extraordinary road to emotional healing opens up for an antisocial children's book writer and a selfless psych ward caretaker when they cross paths.

96462_details.tagline: When you can't control yourself, count to three.

last_episode_to_air.overview: While Sun-woo and Bo-ra set out to change their parents' minds about their relationship, juicy gossip about Taek turns up on the news.
last_episode_to_air.name: Goodbye, My Youth. Goodbye, Ssangmundong.

64010_details.name: Reply 1988
64010_details.overview: Take a nostalgic trip back to the late 1980s through the lives of five families and their five teenage kids living in a small neighborhood in Seoul.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Take a nostalgic trip back to the late 1980s through the lives of five families and their five teenage kids living in a small neighborhood in Seoul.

64010_details.tagline: The year was 1988, a time when it was chilly, but our hearts were fiery, a time when we didn't have much but people's hearts were warm.

last_episode_to_air.overview: As Yi-kyung faces death, the young girl tries to save her. In the ruins of the lab, the soldiers discover other survivors who aren't what they seem.
last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 8

96648_details.name: Sweet Home
96648_details.overview: As humans turn into savage monsters and the world plunges into terror, a handful of survivors fight for their lives — and to hold on to their humanity.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: As humans turn into savage monsters and the world plunges into terror, a handful of survivors fight for their lives — and to hold on to their humanity.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: The stakes are higher than ever as the line between monster and human begins to blur. Can Hyun-su and the other survivors fight to stay alive?

96648_details.tagline: Will you stay a monster or will you stay a human?

last_episode_to_air.overview: Su Ryeon falls over the cliff and doesn't resurface. The rescuers search to no avail. Meanwhile, Seo Jin stands trial for the murder of Oh Yoon Hee and the attempted murder of Su Ryeon. Eun Byeol's testimony against her mother shocks everyone in court. Three years later, at Ro Na and Seok Hoon's recital, Logan chases a woman who looks like Su Ryeon.
last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 14

99489_details.name: The Penthouse
99489_details.overview: A woman puts everything on the line to achieve her goal of being able to move into a luxury penthouse in the Gangnam District. In the process, she gradually finds herself turning into a monster.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: The residents of Hera Palace, a luxury penthouse apartment with 100 floors, have many secrets and hidden ambitions. Sim Su Ryeon, who was born into wealth, is the queen of the penthouse apartment. Cheon Seo Jin, the prima donna of the residence, does all she can to give everything to her daughter. Oh Yoon Hee comes from a poor family background, but she strives to enter high society by becoming the queen of the penthouse, the pinnacle of success in her eyes.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Seo Jin and Dan Tae eventually get rid of everyone who was in their way. They shamelessly frame Yoon Hee for the murder of Su Ryeon and even cover up the death of Seol A. The residents of Hera Palace believe everything will return to how it used to be. However, the tides change when Yoon Hee escapes prison and Eun Byeol discovers the truth. Their mysterious fates are still yet to be seen. Will they manage to protect their precious palace until the very end?

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Su Ryeon finally takes revenge on the residents of Hera Palace. They lost all of their money by investing in Cheonsoo District, and even worse, they stand before the court for covering up Seol A’s death. Those greedy residents of Hera Palace who caught themselves in their own traps end up losing their fortunes, reputations, and everything they had, and Su Ryeon succeeds in getting her revenge on Dan Tae who tried to kill her. When Su Ryeon thought the nightmare is finally over, she witnesses Logan’s death right before her eyes. Who could have planned to murder Logan, and what will happen to the residents of Hera Palace next? Their desire for revenge is not over yet.

last_episode_to_air.overview: Jun-yeong may walk free due to a sorry lack of evidence. When Ji-an loses a loved one, Dong-hoon's brothers make sure she is not left alone.
last_episode_to_air.name: Ji. An.

76662_details.name: My Mister
76662_details.overview: In a world that is less than kind, a young woman and a middle-aged man develop a sense of kinship as they find warmth and comfort in one another.
76662_details.tagline: You're so nice to anyone, like an idiot. That's why you're always suffering.

last_episode_to_air.overview: K and Cream celebrate her birthday together one last time.
last_episode_to_air.name: The Other Side of the Shore

124578_details.name: More than Blue: The Series
124578_details.original_name: 比悲傷更悲傷的故事：影集版
124578_details.overview: A man with a terminal illness seeks to help his beloved find a long-term partner.

last_episode_to_air.overview: Chapter Final
last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 22

70580_details.name: The Perfect Match
70580_details.overview: What do netizens know? Ting En is a celebrated chef whose fine-dining restaurant is a destination for food lovers from all over the world. When Ting En stumbles upon comments on the Internet from people who can’t afford to eat at his high-priced restaurant, they blow his mind. Netizens claim that the culinary creations made by Fen Qing at the night market are just as satisfying as Ting En’s Michelin-worthy food. Determined to debunk such preposterous claims, Ting En goes to the night market to find Fen Qing and show her what true culinary talent really is. Whose cuisine will reign supreme?

91491_details.name: Sexy Central
91491_details.overview: In the bustling center of Hong Kong, five women reckon with betrayal, unrequited love and other matters of the heart

104982_details.name: Unrequited Love
104982_details.overview: A story about a girl's one-sided love for a boy that follows them until they bravely face their feelings for each other. Luo Zhi and Huainan were childhood playmates when they attended a wedding. Because of a family problem, Luo Zhi had been diligently focusing on her studies. She and Huainan were not close in high school though they both ended up in the same university. Destiny brings them together on an excursion in Red Canyon Valley. Their relationship develops as they start to hit it off. However, Ye Zhanyan and Ding Shuijing's meddling as well as complicated personal matters lead to all sorts of misunderstandings.

last_episode_to_air.overview: Angie confronts Wang Jin-guo, Eddie intervenes when Yi-hang approaches Angie, and a new threat emerges for Ling Yun and Yi-hang.
last_episode_to_air.name: The Fortune

96049_details.name: Triad Princess
96049_details.overview: After jostling her way into a gig as a celebrity bodyguard, the boisterous daughter of a powerful triad boss shakes up a TV star's life and finds love.

last_episode_to_air.overview: After making a bold casting choice for her hit reality show, producer Chou Li-wen suddenly finds her own scandalous romantic life under the spotlight.
last_episode_to_air.name: Based on True Events

218177_details.name: At the Moment
218177_details.overview: This anthology series set during the pandemic follows 10 unique love stories of passion and heartache.

last_episode_to_air.overview: Xie Lian returns to the Heavenly Capital and tells Junwu the truth about the banquet massacre. The events have made Xie Lian trust Hua Cheng even more, but Junwu feels even more suspicious of him. Xie Lian leaves heaven and heads to the ruins of Xian Le. As he goes to see his parents' coffin, someone is waiting for him...
last_episode_to_air.name: May All Taboos be Shattered

112398_details.name: Heaven Official's Blessing
112398_details.overview: In a world where select mortals can ascend to godhood and achieve immortality, the disgraced Crown Prince of a centuries-old fallen kingdom ascends to Heaven for the third time after two consecutive demotions, to the dismay of other Heaven Officials. With almost 800 years since his last ascension and all his worshippers long perished, he decides to exorcise ghosts in the mortal world to help him sustain his divinity. An unanticipated encounter with the enigmatic Ghost King whose disdain for the Gods shakes the Heavens finds him solace after prolonged habituated loneliness.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Banished to the mortal realm to exorcise ghosts, a deity reckons with a demon and soon uncovers a dark secret behind the heavenly gods.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Xie Lian, crown prince of Xian Le Kingdom, ascends to Heaven despite successive demotions. However, he accidentally breaks the Gold Palace of heavenly officials. With no human worshiping him, Xie Lian must descend to the secular world to exorcise ghosts.

last_episode_to_air.overview: After giving Wei Young the only antidote pill, Tuoba Jun coughs up blood and collapses. Changru appears with sword in hand and moves toward Wei Young.
last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 54

68358_details.name: The Princess Weiyoung
68358_details.overview: A princess descended from a ruined noble family disguises herself as the woman who saved her life and embarks on a mission to avenge her loved ones.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: After managing to escape from death, Northern Liang's princess takes on the identity of her saviour, Li Wei Young, in order to seek revenge against her enemies who destroyed her kingdom.

last_episode_to_air.overview: Shuwei has demonstrated his love through his actions and decisions. So, Erduo takes it upon herself to do the same in return, no matter the consequences.
last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 24

87299_details.name: I Hear You
87299_details.overview: Bei Er Duo, a girl from an ordinary family, dreams about studying in Japan to be a professional voice actor. However, her mother wants her to marry rich whilst she is young, leading to continuous blind dates which irritate Bei Er Duo. In her desperation to raise funds for studying overseas as well as helping her best friend Tang Li out of a crisis, Bei Er Duo joins a couple reality program, encountering top violin maker Ye Shu Wei.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Love blooms between a bubbly, aspiring voice actress and a cool, enigmatic violin-maker after they cross paths on a reality TV show.

130270_details.name: The Longest Promise
130270_details.overview: From the Kong Sang Continent comes the tale of the tumultuous love story of Princess Zhu Yan of the Chi Yi Tribe and Royal Prince Shi Ying,  The framing of the Queen results in the Prince being banished to Jiu Yi Mountain to cultivate. Once solely focused on his tasks, he develops romantic feelings for his disciple Zhu Yan. But their student/teacher relationship prevents either from expressing their true feelings.  Fate then works against them when they choose opposing sides in a political struggle of life and death proportions.  Eventually, putting aside their issues, they pledge to protect their beloved Kong Sang Continent.

last_episode_to_air.overview: Xiaoxi’s parents show up unannounced while Jiang Chen is staying over. Xiaoxi's friends make a surprise showing during her book signing.
last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 23

75387_details.name: A Love So Beautiful
75387_details.overview: The ups and downs of school, family and growing up test the affection between a budding artist and her handsome but indifferent classmate and neighbor.

last_episode_to_air.overview: Jun-pyo asks Yumi to make the lunchbox again, proving that Yumi had taken credit for the lunch that Jan-di had made for him.
last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 25

16420_details.name: Boys Over Flowers
16420_details.overview: Unassuming high school girl Jan-di stands up to — and eventually falls for — a spoiled rich kid who belongs to the school's most powerful clique.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Working-class girl Geum Jan-di winds up at an exclusive prep academy and teams up with the popular boys of F4, who literally rule the school.

136973_details.name: The Blue Whisper
136973_details.overview: An Oriental fairytale follows the romance between a demon master and a merman. Their relationship started from that of control and being controlled. After a series of conspiracies and misunderstandings, they break free of the barriers between their worlds to become each other's salvation. There are only four remaining places in existence where the use of the ability to control monsters is allowed by imperial rule. In a certain region in the South lives a woman named Ji Yunhe. She is the most powerful demon master with the ability to tame any demon. However, she falls in love with merman Chang Yi and sets him free even at the expense of deceiving him while she becomes imprisoned in endless darkness.

69316_details.name: Eternal Love
69316_details.overview: Three hundred years ago, Bai Qian stood on the Zhu Xian Terrace, turned around and jumped off without regret. Ye Hua stood by the bronze mirror to witness with his own eyes her death. Three hundred years later, in the East Sea Dragon Palace, the two meet unexpectedly. Another lifetime another world, after suffering betrayal Bai Qian no longer feels anything, yet she can't seem to comprehend Ye Hua's actions. Three lives three worlds, her and him, are they fated to love again?

98830_details.name: Find Yourself
98830_details.overview: A love story between an accomplished career woman and a younger man... He Fan Xing's company is at risk of being acquired, while her relationship with Yuan Song faces societal pressures due to their age difference. The consecutive blows in her work and love life push her to an emotional quagmire, and it is during this time that Ye Lu Ming enters her life. Being older in age, he is mature, stable and knowledgeable. He becomes He Fan Xing's life coach and the source of conflict between the couple. For He Fan Xing, it's not merely a matter of choosing the man that she loves, but considering the contradictions of adopting the traditional mindset on marriage.

last_episode_to_air.overview: One place after another, Xia Lin's memory starts to come back. On her sweet wedding day, two other couples also embark their happily ever after.
last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 16

86605_details.name: Well-Intended Love
86605_details.overview: In order to receive a bone marrow transplant quicker and be able to continue her career as an actress, Xia Lin enters into a secret marriage with Ling Yi Zhou, the CEO of a company. Despite the conspiracies and misunderstandings they encounter, the two find true love.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: To secure a bone marrow donation, an actress diagnosed with leukemia makes a marriage pact with a young CEO -- but love and secrets get in the way.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: In order to dispel negative rumors, career-driven artist Xia Lin and business magnate Ling Yizhou stage a fake marriage but soon fall in love.

121870_details.name: No Doubt in Us
121870_details.overview: When an emperor accidentally switches bodies with his empress, the two must deal with the awkward fallouts as they learn to accept each other.

122206_details.name: The Rational Life
122206_details.overview: Shen Ruo Xin is a thirty-something professional who decides to take a stand against unfair societal expectations At her workplace she finds herself drawn  to two different  men - one  her trusted, younger assistant, the other her bachelor boss.  Knowing she is considered a 'leftover woman' weighs heavily on her.  Will  she opt to marry the man society deems appropriate, or will she listen to her heart and screw up the courage to pursue a romance with the younger man?

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: A career-driven 30-something must contend with a cutthroat workplace, a love triangle and her nagging mom.

127323_details.name: Who Rules The World
127323_details.overview: A legendary wuxia romance that focuses on the decade-long romance between Hei Fengxi and Bai Fengxi, and the adventures they embark on together.

95100_details.name: A Little Thing Called First Love
95100_details.overview: An ordinary girl falls head over heels for the most popular boy in school. Xia Miaomiao is a shy, artistic student who develops a crush on a handsome, talented classmate and embarks on a journey of self-discovery through college. Because of Liang Younian, Xia Miaomiao decides to make a change. Through the help of her friends, she starts to learn about fashion, join school clubs, and studies hard to raise her grades. Her ordinary life becoming more colorful by the day.

last_episode_to_air.overview: We don't have an overview translated in English. Help us expand our database by adding one.
last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 24

216405_details.name: Hi Venus
216405_details.overview: Ye Shi Lan, a pediatrician at Taoyuan Village Clinic, starts off on the wrong foot with the new director Lu Zhao Xi due to a misunderstanding. By chance, she becomes his assistant. In solving many problems around running the place and patient treatment, the two fall in love. As they grow together, they come to have a deeper understanding for the mission of doctors to save lives and heal the wounded.

production_companies.name: 浙江华策影视股份有限公司

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview:
A healing romance follows the new "fox" medical director and his "sheep" assistant. Are they each other's "nemesis" or each other's "savior"?

Ye Shi Lan, a pediatrician at Taoyuan Village Clinic, starts off on the wrong foot with the new director Lu Zhao Xi due to a misunderstanding. By chance, she becomes his assistant. In solving many problems around running the place and patient treatment, the two fall in love. As they grow together, they come to have a deeper understanding for the mission of doctors to save lives and heal the wounded.

88548_details.name: Put Your Head on My Shoulder
88548_details.overview: As Si Tu Mo's graduation is nearing, she is confused about her future plans. Her ordinary days are suddenly shaken up when the genius Physics student Gu Wei Yi appears in her life. The two accidentally end up living together and chaos begins.

last_episode_to_air.name: Han Ye and Di Ziyuan are Finally Married

134679_details.name: The Legend of Anle
134679_details.overview: Legend has it that the Han and Di families together established the Great Jing. However, ten years ago, the Di family was convicted of treason, leaving behind only one orphaned girl imprisoned in Daishan. Ten years later, Han Ye, the determined crown prince who aimed to rescue the Di family's lone survivor, unexpectedly crossed paths with a spirited and enchanting female pirate who claimed that she would marry none other than him. She called herself Ren Anle and brought with her a fleet of thirty thousand soldiers, arriving in the capital city to seek the prince's hand in marriage. Throughout the process of relentlessly pursuing Han Ye, Ren Anle demonstrated remarkable wit and intelligence. As their shared values and national aspirations aligned, Han Ye couldn't help but develop affection for Ren Anle.

last_episode_to_air.overview: Qingcang and Xiao Lanhua team up to save the three realms from a deviant god, but one of them must pay the ultimate price.
last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 36

130368_details.name: Love Between Fairy and Devil
130368_details.overview: When a low-ranked fairy accidentally resurrects a powerful demon, their fates become cosmically entangled as the world is thrown into turmoil.

82817_details.name: Go Go Squid!
82817_details.overview: Tong Nian is a genius 19-year-old student with high IQ and low EQ, who is also a famous anime cosplay person and sings well. She’s falls in love at first sight with Han Shang Yan, who is a game genius in the e-sports world and never pays attention to the girls.

122182_details.name: The Long Ballad
122182_details.overview: Li Chang Ge's family was murdered by Li Shi Min, the Emperor of Tang, during the Xuanwu Gate Incident. She heads to Shuo Province under the guise of a man with hopes of raising an army to kill Li Shi Min to avenge her family's death. However, as a captain of the army of Shuo Province in Zhangzhou, she loses a siege by the Eastern Turkic Khaganate General Ashina Sun, who takes her to serve him as a personal military strategist.

last_episode_to_air.overview: Nai proposes to Weiwei publicly in an interview and passes the test of Weiwei's father. They finally get married and live happily ever after.
last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 30

66776_details.name: Love O2O
66776_details.overview: What is it that makes a man fall in love with a woman at first sight? Appearance? Aura? Wealth? NO, when campus prince and gaming expert, student Xiao Nai first saw Bei Wei Wei, what made him fall in love was not her extraordinary beauty, but her slim and slender fingers that were flying across the keyboard and her calm and composed manner!!! Embarrassing, no? At the same time, gaming expert Bei Wei Wei, at this time and place is on the computer, methodically commanding a guild war, and won a perfect and glorious victory despite being at a disadvantage, and was completely unaware that cupid is nearby. Soon after basketball player, swimmer, all-around excellent student, and game company president, Xiao Nai, uses both tactics on and off-line to take this beauty’s heart. Therefore this romance slowly bloomed.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: When a computer-science major gets dumped by her “husband” in an online role-playing game, she attracts a new proposal from the game’s top player.

last_episode_to_air.overview: Two star-crossed lovers exchange their one last toast. As the world hangs on the brink of destruction, Susu finally grasps what Tantai Jin truly wants.
last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 40

137206_details.name: Till The End of The Moon
137206_details.overview: In an era when the demons are in power, they are the masters of the despicable cultivators and mortals. The cultivator elders deem it necessary to send someone back in time, to determine the origin of the demon lord and to prevent his awakening. Li Su Su accepts the mission, becoming the mortal Ye Xi Wu, General Ye's third daughter who is married to Tantai Jin, the hostage prince and future demon lord. She is determined to destroy Tantai Jin, who in the future will massacre many. But as a witness to Tantai Jin's past life and rise to power, an unexpected tale emerges, one complicating her quest.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: To defeat a fearsome demon lord, a brave fighter journeys into the past and discovers their destiny-bound connection across realms and time.

81502_details.name: The Story of Ming Lan
81502_details.original_name: 知否知否应是绿肥红瘦
81502_details.overview: The Story of Ming Lan, based on the novel written by Guan Xin Ze Luan, follows our heroine through her youth, into her adulthood, and well into her marriage life as well. She’s the 6th child of the Sheng household. Though she is an intelligent and beautiful child, she was not loved by her family (her dad, her sisters, her mom dies early.) She has to hide her intelligence and suffers through the years, hoping to avenge for her mom. During this process she will meet many friends and foes, one of which is our male lead, Gu’s second son, Gu Ting Ye. He has helped and mistreated her before, but also the one to witness her sharp wits and lonely soul. After they get married, they will work together as a power couple, managing the new King’s regime as well as harvesting a world of happiness on their own.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: In the Northern Song Dynasty, the daughter of a concubine falls for a high-ranking official's son as she devises a plan to avenge her mother's death.

95486_details.name: Falling Into Your Smile
95486_details.overview: Student Tong Yao makes two vows: to never be in a relationship with someone in the same field and to make up for the Chinese League of Legends. When Tong Yao earns her spot as the first formal female player in China's professional league, she catches the attention of an elite team captain. Facing doubts and inconveniences, she meets each challenge with her own persistence and her teammates' support. After much effort, what will become of her vows? Will she stand on the world stage to make up for six years of regret? Will she avoid a romantic entanglement within the e-sports world?  Adapted from the novel You're Beautiful When You Smile by Qing Mei.

last_episode_to_air.overview: Xiaoyuan grapples with what she's learned about the Lighthouse System, only for Qi Lian and her to face their greatest danger yet.
last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 30

237918_details.name: Derailment
237918_details.overview: Do you believe that there exist countless parallel universes that are exactly like the world you live in? Jiang Xiaoyuan finds herself struggling with her identity as she travels across parallel universes that never seem to intersect. In her original world, she is an invincible wealthy daughter, but in another place, she becomes an ordinary working girl who has absolutely nothing. Along the way, she meets the mysterious Qi Lian and together, they search for the truth involving the mystery surrounding her. Stripped of wealth, family background, appearance, and education, Jiang Xiaoyuan sets herself on a journey to find pieces of her "real" identity.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Do you believe that there exist countless parallel universes that are exactly like the world you live in? Jiang Xiaoyuan finds herself struggling with her identity as she travels across parallel universes that never seem to intersect. In her original world, she is an invincible wealthy daughter, but in another place, she becomes an ordinary working girl who has absolutely nothing. Along the way, she meets the mysterious Qi Lian and together, they search for the truth involving the mystery surrounding her. Stripped of wealth, family background, appearance, and education, Jiang Xiaoyuan sets herself on a journey to find pieces of her "real" identity.

last_episode_to_air.overview: Gao Jianhong reveals his struggles over all these years. Accompanied by friends, Li Xun and Zhu Yun progress to the next phase of their lives.
last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 36

134331_details.name: Lighter and Princess
134331_details.overview: As soon as Zhu Yun started college life, the world was completely turned upside down by the intrusion of "bad boy" Li Xun. He was regarded by Zhu Yun as a rich, ignorant and incompetent son, but his real identity was actually a special admissions student who was admitted by the school, and a rare programming genius. After several confrontations, the two have some appreciation for each other. The senior Fang Zhijing made things difficult for Zhu Yun many times, Li Xun took action to protect Zhu Yun, and invited her to join the preparation team he set up to win a major programming competition on behalf of the school.

last_episode_to_air.overview: As the final pieces of Dong-eun's revenge plot slot into place, she considers what comes next — and what it will mean for Yeo-jeong.
last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 16

136283_details.name: The Glory
136283_details.overview: After a childhood marked by pain and violence, a woman puts a carefully planned revenge scheme in motion.

last_episode_to_air.overview: Yiyang's secret social media account is uncovered by fans. On a post-match getaway, he nervously poses a question to Yin Guo on a post-match getaway.
last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 30

221112_details.name: Amidst a Snowstorm of Love
221112_details.overview:
As a professional billiards player, Yin Guo has become quite a notable athlete. After receiving an invitation to play in a tournament in Hel, Yin Guo eagerly accepts. Little does she know that what will follow will change her life forever.

Before Yin Guo can even start training for the upcoming competition, an unexpected snowstorm leaves her stranded with Lin Yi Yang, and an instant connection is made. Helped along by her cousin, Yin Guo and Yi Yang continue to get to know each other better long after the storm subsides. But even as they draw closer, Yin Guo has no idea that Yi Yang has quite a bit of history in the world of professional billiards. A true genius in the sport, Yi Yang once basked in the spotlight of professional billiards fame, but that was a long time ago.

Inspired by Yin Guo’s love of the sport, Yi Yang decides the time is right to return to the world of professional billiards.

(Source: Viki)

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: When a billiards savant meets an elite player, their spark inspires him to win her over by taking another shot at the professional career he left behind.

last_episode_to_air.overview: Chishui Fenglong raises a big question to Xiaoyao. As political tension escalates, Cang Xuan must prepare for the worst- case scenario.
last_episode_to_air.name: Zijin Peak

210524_details.name: Lost You Forever
210524_details.overview: In ancient times, humans, gods, and demons lived together, and the three kingdoms of Shennong, Xuanyuan, and Gaoxin stood together. Jiuyao (Xiaoyao) has gone through a hundred years of suffering, losing not only her identity but also her appearance. She settles down in Qingshui Town, becoming Wen Xiaoliu.

last_episode_to_air.overview: Even for a man as patient and steadfast as Je-hyeok, sometimes life in prison just gets to be too much, which leads him to come to a drastic decision.
last_episode_to_air.name: The Last Chapter

74821_details.name: Prison Playbook
74821_details.overview: With his major league baseball debut right around the corner, a star pitcher lands in prison and must learn to navigate his new world.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: With his major league baseball debut right around the corner, a star pitcher lands in prison and must learn to navigate his new world.

74821_details.tagline: Even if you live for one day, live as a good person.

last_episode_to_air.overview: Both Sunny and Eun Tak inadvertently hurt their partners, who must come to terms with their decisions.
last_episode_to_air.name: Goodbye and See You Again

67915_details.name: Goblin
67915_details.overview: In his quest for a bride to break his immortal curse, a 939-year-old guardian of souls meets a grim reaper and a sprightly student with a tragic past.
67915_details.tagline: A mysterious romance between a goblin and a young human bride.

last_episode_to_air.overview: In a heartfelt moment, Lurang poses a significant question to Zaizai. On their wedding day, they reflect on their beautiful journey together.
last_episode_to_air.name: When I Fly Towards You

228547_details.name: When I Fly Towards You
228547_details.overview: Set off by a sweet chance encounter, 16-year-old Su Zaizai finds herself helplessly drawn to Zhang Lurang — her smart, charming yet distant schoolmate.

216424_details.name: Meet Yourself
216424_details.overview: Because of the death of her best friend, Xu Hongdou's life and work falls into a slump. She goes to the "windy courtyard" in Yun Miao Village, Dali, to recuperate by herself. There, she meets Xie Zhiyao, a local who quit his high-paying job and has returned to his hometown to start a business, with a group of peers from big cities. Xie Zhiyao begins to see Xu Hongdou's kindness and seriousness. He invites her to use her years of experience in the hotel industry to help local employees improve their service awareness and help develop Yun Miao Village's cultural tourism business. At the same time, Xu Hongdou is moved by Xie Zhiyao's ideal of building a hometown so that the villagers can be independent and lead a purposeful life. The two fall in love and finally came together. As they work together they re-examin their past, help and inspire each other, start to heal and gain the strength to begin their lives again in this "windy place".

last_episode_to_air.overview: Jin Ho-gyeong takes a risk to protect Jinyowon and its treasures from attack. Having had a glimpse into the future, Uk braces for the inevitable.
last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 10

135157_details.name: Alchemy of Souls
135157_details.overview: A powerful sorceress in a blind woman's body encounters a man from a prestigious family, who wants her help to change his destiny.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: A powerful sorceress in a blind woman's body encounters a man from a prestigious family, who wants her help to change his destiny.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Jang Uk, now a fierce but troubled hunter of the soul shifters, meets an imprisoned young woman who seeks his help to reclaim her freedom.

last_episode_to_air.overview: Young-woo receives evidence that could make or break her case, while Min-woo changes his plans — and Jun-ho follows his heart.
last_episode_to_air.name: Though Unusual and Peculiar

197067_details.name: Extraordinary Attorney Woo
197067_details.overview: Brilliant attorney Woo Young-woo tackles challenges in the courtroom and beyond as a newbie at a top law firm and a woman on the autism spectrum.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Brilliant attorney Woo Young-woo tackles challenges in the courtroom and beyond as a newbie at a top law firm and a woman on the autism spectrum.

197067_details.tagline: My name is Woo Young-woo, whether it is read straight or flipped. Kayak, deed, rotator, noon, racecar, Woo Young-woo.

107329_details.name: Go Ahead
107329_details.overview: Growing up in dysfunctional households, three individuals who are unrelated by blood treat each other like family as they yearn for the love that they cannot find at home. Eldest brother Ling Xiao, second brother He Ziqiu, and youngest sister Li Jianjian grow up together, experiencing life’s joy and strife as they support each other’s chosen paths. As Ling Xiao and He Ziqiu graduate from high school, they return to their original families. Five years later, the three are reunited, but the heartaches from their complicated family past becomes a shadow that constantly lingers. Can they finally fix their personal issues to become better versions of themselves?

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Three friends from troubled families form a unique, lasting bond — but their pasts soon cast a cloud over their lives.

last_episode_to_air.overview: Ready to pursue his next dream, Ung sets his sights on studying overseas. When he asks Yeon-su to join him, she has a tough decision to make.
last_episode_to_air.name: Our Beloved Summer

135897_details.name: Our Beloved Summer
135897_details.overview: Years after filming a viral documentary in high school, two bickering ex-lovers get pulled back in front of the camera — and into each other's lives.
